name: Dead Friends (Torin Porter, Thom Duncan)
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD to move

Left Click/Spacebar/E to recruit a friend

Esc to quit (bug: Sorry, quitting doesn't work if the player dies)

HOW TO PLAY

Make friends to fight for you and get to the helipad! You cannot shoot so you must rely on your friends.

Hungry guy: consumes supplies and won't join until you have enough

Violent guy: loves violence and will leave if he gets bored. Keep fighting!

Pacifist guy: hates violence and will leave if he has to fight too much

Introvert: will only join your group if it's under 6 members and will leave if it get's too crowded.

Extrovert: will only join your group if it's over 3 members and will leave if the group gets too small.
